Summary: Bright light(s) flash then disappear and eventually flies off to outerspace
trends: There have been no other sightings in Emeryville
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsi was standing in the alleyway behind a pizza shop talking to my friend on the phone about spiritual transcendence in the 8 o clock hour in emeryville, california..where it is usually very bright being in the middle of berkeley and oakland. i was staring off to the south direction and saw this bright light very far away 'shoot off' in a curved path..kind of like a hill path\swivel moving from the south to the west. moving in this path, it disappears. this was very quick-only a matter of seconds. i decided to not think too much of it(because the oak airport was in that direction) even though it gave me a weird feeling. so about 15 minutes later im starting due east and above the building i saw the same bright light again and same distance away(very far) flash and shoot straight up and dissappear again. at that point i'd known it was strange. i continue to search the area while still on the phone with my friend speaking very excitedly about it. at 8:54 pm it reappears maybe 3 thumbs up from where it last appeared and then i watched it for maybe a minute or so move out of the earth's atmosphere going south east from my vision. i did not see it again. i had the suspecting feeling it was not 3 different objects but 1 that kept moving. the strange thing was is that i had planned to go to a ufo conference the next day by uc berkeley. what's also weird is the people holding this conference kept running into me all week as they were putting up flyers. i went to the conference...they were very..hm, strange creatures. (to not go into detail..)
